#include<stdio.h>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
int main(){
    ll int n,i,count1,count2;
    scanf("%lld",&n);

    ll int arr[10000];
    for ( i = 0 ; i < n ;i++){
        scanf("%lld",&arr[i]);

    }
    count1=0;
    count2=0;
    for ( i = 0 ; i < n ;i++){
        if ( arr[i]%2==0)
            count1++;
        else
            count2++;

    }
    cout << abs ( count1-count2)<<endl;

}
